page.title: 11ROWANFIELD AND ALSTONE
page.content: {RELIGION.}St Peter's,listed Victorian Church, built 1838,copying 11/12th Cen tury Normandy{churches.}Apsidol, brightly decorated, cone shaped tower with nave and dome. Stained glass windows, illustrating St Peter's life, include his keys to Heaven and Hell. Reredos at rear copies Leonardo's Last Supper. Christchurch was built by sub- scriptions from many retired East India Company employees.{Education}rep resented by Ladies College (extensive local property owners),C of E School and an LEA Primary School. {EVENTS.}Unsolved murder - Granny Aris hacked to death in own armchair!! Mo- tive possibly robbery,nothing of great value taken. Police still confident they will apprehend villain. Respect- able road (once servants' quarters to rich Victorian householders) residents remain apprehensive and shocked.
